post.body: thanks! nice to meet you!
no -- I wouldn't say my blog posts attract a lot of controversy.:)
like I haven't told you at least half of them:)
I'm going in a few hours to decorate my parents' Christmas tree... woo! wild party life!
and that's reason number 8,439 I love you.
love love love
can i be an honourary jew?
@RoxyRoller that one sent her over the edge
soy nuts
pine nuts
no problem! happy to do it.
You got lucky this time, punk.:)
we don't tweet about what we do before the sofa.:)
Ha! He just took off in SLC. I'll be with him pretty soon.:)
just like this: "parttimecashier"
how is your degree from the Afternoon Technical College of Excellence performing for you?
okay, seriously now.
you may be psychotic
i think you're more excited about this than we are.:)
um. i'm quite scared of the clowns.
um, holy crap, I may have to unfollow you until you change your avatar because AAAAAAAA CLOWN
i like you in my stream.
no. certainly not. ha!
it's okay, honey! he likes a challenge!
i think she'd like to be with her fiance's family, yeah.:) i'm three hours away from her now, anyway.:)
is coming up in conversation lots. my dad even said, 'well, you'll likely be married in Boston by then.' wow.
me too, 100%.
going somewhat off-grid (i know!) love to all!
some people are just lightning rods when they write, and yet they seem to have no idea why. :)
one week until @gradontripp meets my whole nutty family.
my ringtone is now my friend saying "answer your damn phone!"
also big love to @thespottedduck @whitneyhess @globalcitizen @gruen @brett. just because.
"hard times" is a vague value. to one person, it's putting off buying a second car. to another, putting off having a second meal in the day.
macadamia nuts
just tweeting @mknell's name so he knows I was thinking about him.:D
asthma mystery solved. i can't tell you how, or what it was, but it can be fixed.:D
I came third in Best Personal Blog in the CBAs -- thank you SO much for all your votes. Again, I am the third most personal person.:)
http://tinyurl.com/2954gh ha!
chillin' with our matching quad lattes.:)
he's heeeere.
on my way to the AIIIIIIIIRPORT!!!!!!!!!!
http://tinyurl.com/5tt4m6 @globalcitizen gives an @mknell shoutout in the latest Notion to Motion!
http://tinyurl.com/665b8r I'm just saying. (again)
http://tinyurl.com/6k7axk I'm just saying.
my relatives are certifiable.:)
welcoming in the relatives... of course, I just saw them six days ago, when @gradontripp was here... :D
turkey in the oven. first turkey for me in.... two years!
christmas haiku: http://tinyurl.com/7gp2pl
i am in the guest room at the 'rents, doing a last check on her flight status before i go make coffee and bug my mom.:)
MERRY CHRISTMAS!! So far, my best friend's flight outta here looks good. Cross your fingers/pray/burn plants and wave them about.
http://www.flickr.com/photos/megworld/3135185716/ and a shot from my ride to my parents' home today!
http://tinyurl.com/7gp2pl christmas haiku!
and a merry christmas to you, mr. @gradontripp. here's to spending the next one together. xoxo
love, love, love to you all, and a merry christmas!
just ordered my mom years of her favourite design mags. :)
we got her a ticket on a plane out of seattle. cross your fingers it goes.
my poor lovely best friend stranded by a cancelled bus in seattle. jerks. staying the night in a hotel. please pray she gets to Eric.
watching choirs on tv, missing my choirgirl days bigtime. heading out into the storm to collect chinese takeout. awesome.
made it here. dad is super driver, 4 wheel drive kicks ass, too. now for movies, games, chinese food, prepping for turkey dinner tomorrow.
http://tinyurl.com/7gwhea holy crap.
